text: Orton or Orison Whipple Hungerford Jr., known as Ty Hardin (January 1, 1930 â€“ August 3, 2017) was a former American actor. He was born in New York City. Hardin was best known as the star of the 1958 to 1962 ABC/Warner Brothers western television series Bronco. Hardin died in Dallas, Texas on August 3, 2017 at the age of 87. ==References== ==Other websites== * Ty Hardin official website * * Ty Hardin at Brian's Drive-In Theater * Ty Hardin interview with Joe Krein * Riptide Australian TV series Category:1930 births Category:2017 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from New York City
title: Ty Hardin
